Summary: triangle with 3 flashing lights. multiple hovering
divs: Sighting Detailsi was outside with my coison just chilling when i got a nice glimpse of the moon on the southern east side. i saw a really nice star right under it, but to my surprise, it was moving. at first, i thought it was an airplane, but then i noticed it hovered over the moon, revealing its unique triangular shape. slowly it moved to the west and then i saw it wasnt just one, it was 3. they all slowly followed the first one i saw, then surprisingly airplanes and hellicopters followed it also. it then slowly faded out into the horizon heading west, aka Los Angeles
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Pomona
